# üåê Artist Landing Page Generator  
*Draft operational automation template.*

## Purpose
Automate creation of a personalized landing page for artists using Flame Division MusicAI tools.

---

## 1. Data Collected
- Artist name  
- Bio  
- Photo or avatar  
- Featured track  
- Links (Spotify, Apple, IG, TikTok)  
- Brand colors or theme  

---

## 2. Auto-Generated Sections
Landing page includes:
- Hero banner  
- Artist statement  
- Featured music player  
- Social link buttons  
- Press kit (optional)  
- AI-generated promotional copy  

---

## 3. Optional Add-Ons
- Electronic Press Kit (EPK)  
- Beat store integration  
- Booking form  
- Mailing list widget  
- Merch preview  

---

## 4. Versioning
Each landing page is stored under:
